before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6k017","text":"Take into account that the quality of the results is greatly affected by the time from sample extraction to DNA amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o4jc","text":"The protocol may fail if the protocol is performed from refrigerated samples or DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"86h29","text":"This protocol is a procedure for the study of antiviral resistance in Cytomegalovirus by NGS techniques.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ej2b","text":"The primers have been designed using https://primalscheme.com/ with the intention of covering the most relevant regions of the UL54 and UL97 genes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":25}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"75F59E08936511EE959A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://primalscheme.com"}}}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"15io1","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctp66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm1j4","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"eq33i","text":"Pool 1 UL54 (odd primers LEFT and RIGHT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s65t","text":"Pool 2 UL54 (even primers LEFT and RIGHT)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23t5j","text":"Use   for each primer    except:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7se8i","text":"UL54_14_LEFT/RIGHT 14: 2,5 µl ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1pr7","text":"UL54_5_LEFT/RIGHT: 5 µl ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uv20","text":"UL54_13_LEFT/RIGHT: 5 µl ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2k31","text":"UL54_15_LEFT/RIGHT: 20 µl ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5t73","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"B91470DD8F8711EE94090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","concentration":"10","error":false,"error_concentration":false,"guid":"B91471678F8711EE94090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5je23","text":"Add 40 uL of beads to 20 uL of amplicon. Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e0oac","text":"Incubate the mixture for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eku28","text":"Place the tube in the magnet until the solution becomes clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f8ngp","text":"Gently remove the supernatant by pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"agds3","text":"Add 180 uL of 70% ethanol. Mix without breaking the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eup4c","text":"Gently discard the ethanol by pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2vhvo","text":"Incubate for 2 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apmfc","text":"Remove any remaining ethanol. Note: The pellet must not be allowed to dry excessively. If it does occur, the pellet will appear black and cracked.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6ejuq","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1sc04","text":"Add 25 uL of EB. Mix. Note: do not break the pellet, just peel it away from the wall of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21hg2","text":"Incubate for 2 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"76n3j","text":"Place the tube back in the magnet until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmqo2","text":"Transfer 20 uL of the supernatant to a new tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"trbj","text":"Sequence the amplicons using the sequencer of choice according to the manufacturer's instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe1p0","text":"Generate consensus sequence from the amplicons using the bioinformatics procedure of choice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8smr8","text":"Take into account that in cases of previous exposure to antivirals or prolonged treatment, minority variants may appear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70sbt","text":"The website http://cmv-resistance.ucl.ac.uk/herpesdrg/ is helpful for the study of resistance mutations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":42}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F1F19101936411EE959A0A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://cmv-resistance.ucl.ac.uk/herpesdrg"}}}}

title: CMV Resistance testing (UL54 and UL97)
